attributes.action: Stop the media from talking about covid, or coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: Because for the last 8 months it's being nothing but covid 19 and the truth is the virus as ruined the year why should we be reminded of it every 5 minutes
attributes.background: Stop the media from fear mongering when it comes to covid. I understand government announcements are crucial but thats all we need

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding what the media can report on.
